Type Property# withColonSeparatorInTime

iOS 10.0+iPadOS 10.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.12+tvOS 10.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 3.0+

```
static var withColonSeparatorInTime: ISO8601DateFormatter.Options { get }
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/foundation/iso8601dateformatter/options/withcolonseparatorintime#Discussion)

The date representation uses the colon separator (`:`) in the time.
